attributes.action: Stop teachers from stopping you from getting water
attributes.additional_details: I know many other people have had experiences  where they have been told there can't get water because you've just had break or lunch. people should be allowed to get water whenever they want. Teachers stop students from getting water because they should be doing work but this is completely hypocritical.
attributes.background: I am a students(im called joey) of a school and I have had many experiences where I have desperately needed water and have ran out of water. I asked the teacher if I can get some water and I was told no as I should do my work and I can tell you being incredibly dehydrated affects how well you work.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual teachers to take depending on the circumstances at the time.
